alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:29AM CDT until April 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity affecting Franklin Parish. For the Lower Ouachita...including Alto, Fort Necessity, Tendal, Newlight, Como, Clayton, Jonesville L&D, Acme...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 50.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 50.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Boeuf River Fort Necessit 50.0 50.0 Sat 9 am CDT 50.5 50.0 49.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CDT.
